column5: I was invited up to a cottage on Long Lake ( Frontenac ) for the August long weekend. Searched for some info but didn't find much. Im wondering if it worth bringing the boat. If anyone has any info about the lake it would be much appreciated. PM if you prefer Thanks
If this is the lake I am thinking of (between Geraldton and Hearst on highway 11) you are in for a treat. It's sooooooo much fun to fish. I did a report almost 3 years ago on it.
